description: Marcus Ruhl"The Titan"Ht: 5'11" WT: 210lbs Season W/L record ( 1-0)Ricky Larkin"The Legend"Ht: 5'11" WT: 195lbsSeason W/L record (0-0) Two muscled body builders step into the ring to fight for sexual glory. Returning is Marcus "The Titan" Ruhl going against newcomer Ricky "The Legend" Larkin. Ricky says he has five years of wrestling and some boxing under his belt, and he plans on using it against his oversized opponent. As soon as the whistle blows The Legend goes in and body slams The Titan to the ground. The Titan is unfazed and quickly goes for The Legend's back, catching him in a full nelson as he yanks on The Legend's balls. Both studs are oiled down in the third round as they fight for the win with raging hard cocks. Will The Legend prove himself worthy of NK or will he have to submit to The Titan's fat, uncut cock up his ass? This match was shot before the Summer Smackdown Tournament
title: Marcus "Titan" Ruhl vs Ricky "The Legend" Larkin - Oiled Up Muscle
